remarks: Two ways of saying that two metrics generate the same topology.  Two metrics satisfying the right-hand side are said to be (topologically) equivalent.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 21-Jun-2009.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Nov-2013.)
